My favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once.
I love to play board games.
For vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.background:
I am terrified of scorpions.
I am employed by the us postal service.
I have a german shepherd named barnaby.
My father drove a car for nascar.

content.text: Hi there! I'm [user 1's name].
Hello! I'm [user 2's name].
What do you do for a living?
I'm a mail carrier for the US Postal Service.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought it would be interesting to be a mail carrier.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging sometimes.
I bet! What's the most challenging part of the job?
The most challenging part is the long hours. I usually work 10-12 hours a day, and I'm on my feet all day long.
That sounds tough! But I'm sure it's rewarding, too.
It is! I love getting to meet new people and delivering mail to them.
I bet that's a lot of fun! What's your favorite part of the job?
My favorite part is getting to see all the different things that people send in the mail. I've seen everything from birthday cards to wedding invitations to packages full of clothes.
That must be really cool! I've never thought about it that way before.
It is! It's always interesting to see what people are up to.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to play board games and watch movies. I also have a German Shepherd named Barnaby.
Oh, I love board games too! I'm not very good at them, but I always have fun.
Me too! I'm not very good at them either, but I love the competition.
What's your favorite board game?
My favorite board game is Monopoly. It's so much fun to try to get rich and buy all the properties.
I love Monopoly too! I always get so competitive when I play.
Me too! I love trying to win.
What about movies? What's your favorite genre?
I love action movies! I love the excitement and the thrill of it all.
I love action movies too! I love the suspense and the action sequences.
Me too! They're so much fun to watch.
What are some of your favorite action movies?
Some of my favorite action movies are The Dark Knight, Mad Max: Fury Road, and Mission Impossible: Fallout.
I love all of those movies! They're so good.
Me too! They're some of the best action movies ever made.
